full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BLA MA YI DAM CHOS SKYONG BSRUNG MA TSOGS LA GSER SKYEMS 'BUL TSUL DANG, DAM CAN CHOS KYI RGYAL PO'I GSER SKYEMS 'BUL TSUL ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003A *, ,(CES BLA MA YI DAM SRUNG MA'I TSOGS LA GSER SKYEMS 'BUL BA'I CHO GA MCHOD SPRIN RGYA MTSO ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, STOBS LDAN PA RDZONG DKAR RDZONG BZHUGS RGYAL BRTZEGS CHOS MDZAD KYIS 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES @003B BSKUL BA LA BRTEN NAS, DGE SLONG YE SHES RGYAL MTSAN GYIS BKRA SHIS BSAM GTAN GLING DU SBYAR BA'O, ,'DIS KYANG SKYE 'GRO YONGS LA PHAN PAR GYUR CIG , ,,DGE'O, ,)
